thisfile: This file can be used to install your own mods or distribute your mods to other users
remarks:
This remarks section is not necessary. It is only here for explanation. the apk will not read/use it. description - Description in the "My Mods" pull down menu android - The android version; currently 5.1.1, 6.0.1 or universal (apk works on any version). rombuilddate - The date the ROM was built. NOT the release date. This can be found in the unzipped 5009_60.zip under /system/build.prop. For example: The 6.0.1 07 July ROM mentions: "ro.build.date=2017-06-29 11:43:58 Thursday". This means rombuilddate is 20170629. rombuilddate can also be universal (works on any sub version of the mentioned android version). modtype - Is it a "radio/videoplayer/musicplayer/bluetooth/sofiaserver/other" mod. This is important. In case of a radio for example, some automatic checks can be done. Same for the other "known" mods. Only "other" will be dealt with in another way. linktype - web or file. web requires in origin something like "http://full_path_to_apk/" (or https://). file requires something like "/sdcard/full_path_to_apk/". filename - The apk that needs to be installed, for example JY-1-C9-Radio-V1.0.apk (lowercase/uppercase is important) origin - the location from where the apk should be downloaded or copied, and then installed, like "/myFantasticMod/myradiomod.apk" (root of the internal sdcard), or http://www.mywebsite.org/myradiomod.apk, or some google drive link like https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B4J4kKZoV78-RXRLam9hc01yMmM (note that such a link is the reason why I need the filename) Pay attention to uppercase/lowercase!! Only directly downloadable links work. Download services like Mega.nz or yandisk do not work as they require web browser interaction. installpath - Folder location where the apk needs to be pushed to. Incase of a "known mod" (radio/videoplayer/musicplayer/bluetooth/sofiaserver), this is not necessary reboot - is a reboot necessary (yes/no). If yes, a reboot notification will be displayed with the reboot option behind it. For a known mod it will be added anyway.
Examples below! Radio mod install from sdcard, Radio mod install from web Bluetooth mod install (original can be installed from my apk already) In case of other mod you might need to specify the original yourself.
